channel.title: Looking for a podcast co-host
channel.description:
So Im thinking of starting a podcast on bootstrapping, and looking for a co-host. Format will be like Ian/Andreys, bit of light weight chat, discussion on bootstrapping etc.
You don't need:
* An attractive voice * A successful business * Fancy equipment
You do need:
* A willingness to show up and record and regular intervals
If anyone is interested, reply or send me a pm.
